price: 52. Mpe liboso na bango, bato ya Nûh bazalaki babubi mpe balekisaki ndelo.
arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ هُمۡ أَظۡلَمَ وَأَطۡغَىٰ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: waqawma nūḥin min qablu innahum kānū hum aẓlama wa-aṭghā
